cPlHlG_NBntW3N7Bln8SGw.text: The burger was great and we had excellent customer service. Friday's are very busy. This is a great place for families.

beuWOWsRF8NvBsiOf-K64A.text: For a bar, this place was fantastic. Wide beer selection,  great atmosphere and terrific service. I have to come back here to try their food. Thrilled this place is in the neighborhood. The place was filled too with lots of friendly people having a good time. Perfect after work spot

NK_WUPy_iLmkT5IADEnZwA.text: The burgers here are awesome! My son and I came here a few months ago for the first time. Everyone was very friendly. The owner stopped by to say hello and ask how our experience was. Have had several to go orders since then. I always get a burger because they are so good, so I can't speak for any of the other items. Great place!

xVCpYZC5SPsmqRQCShfP2Q.text: Have been a regular family patron for years.  Friday night, Jan. 2, 2015, went there and was treated so poorly by owners we will never return.  All we wanted was the hot wings for 11 year old he has enjoyed for over a year.  Because he wasn't very hungry we got the kid portion not knowing this place has some "policy" over no hot sauce for kid meal.  We asked to have them redone and male owner was RUDE about it.  Refused to listen or for me to explain he eats hot wings every Friday night.  He should know his regular customers.  Female owner came over and was full of excuses and whiny.    All we wanted was the wings to be served as we ordered them.  Why are we arguing about a chicken wing?  Don't punish your regular paying patrons for someone else's doing.  This used to be a regular place for our family.  I was embarrassed by how we were treated in front of 4 kids.  This place has been changing from a family atmosphere to a loud, pop music, with young, snotty wait staff for some time.  With owners as the example they proved to be I can see why the wait staff has no guidance.  Would not recommend this place for families or if your kid has a taste for anything off the kid menu.  We would have ordered the adult meal as usual had we known this was going to be so difficult.  Did not appreciate the attitude from owner and will not return.

dZ6d6Vu9gK8WubUcUDGTZA.text: You have to get the notorious PIG. The best burger I've eaten in a long time. And the sweet potato tots with cinnamon butter. The service was great and they were willing to make accommodations for your needs. It's the only restaurant I've been to that when I asked for gluten free they asked if it was a preference or an allergy. Highly recommended.

3OCKucOUHNs8VuoNAASeIQ.text: This place is great! Fantastic specials and the service is great. Great place to relax, have a beer, and build your own burger. The co-owner was cleaning tables and stopped by the table to welcome us to Mint Hill for the first time. Looking forward to the next time I'm in Mint Hill.

zO_1EejlR3l9y5cHvPzDjg.text: Great place! I 'misordered' and they were very nice about correcting it and making exactly what I wanted.  An excellent addition to the Mint Hill restaurant options. Yummy food. We will definitely be back!!

vpZ3ExqMEQPrZy7QFoiIlQ.text: We just ate lunch here. My friends had the Salmon Burger and said it was amazing. I had a flatbread pizza (the Breakfast one) and it was SOOOO good! We will def be back

PvZQhmFvS6sj_o9l0zgKow.text: I went here for the first time Thursday night for wing night. Fantastic wings!!! So many different kinds to try!! Fabulous fries!! Great atmosphere! Great music! Couldn't wait to tell my son. We don't go out to eat as a family to often but this is our kind of place! Brought my son Friday night and again had a great experience. My son built a beautiful salad, I had the taco salad and of course a side of fries. Next week we're trying burger's and fish fry! Wish we had this place instead of Hickory Tavern in Sun Valley. 4 out of 5 cause it's not big enough. But, worth the 30 minute wait on a Friday night

pD5CzbOb9uUBhFANHHO5CQ.text: I travel for work extensively and this place seemed like a great place to get a meal. It was busy so I sat at the bar and waited patiently. A good bit of time goes by, wait staff look at me multiple times, and no one said a word to me. One bartender was chatting it up leaning on a cooler with both elbows and looked at me multiple times, literally next to me, and she didn't say a word, just kept talking to her friends. Not a place I'd ever go back to or recommend to anyone.

EeIlsIGuDFhF-S3cxX4Vcw.text: Don't understand why my first review was moved to the filtered section and hidden from public view, but I'm writing another one. Hopefully Yelp will leave this one alone! AND NO I'M NOT A ROBOT OR INSIDER....JUST A HAPPY CUSTOMER...!!!   Dunwellz is an amazing new favorite place for my family...especially my son. He never finishes burgers when we go out, but he sat and forced himself to finish his burger because he said it was too good not to! Build your own burgers (and turkey burgers), and the prices are FAR FROM over priced and there is more than enough food and you will not be left hungry. Friendly staff and atmosphere, feel free to go check them out yourself!

zBkiNzDztpkOBbmUcj8wJw.text: I come here all the time. 3 times in the past 2 weeks. Great place to hang out and watch the game. Definitely gonna be here for Super Bowl this year. The service is great and I haven't tried anything that I didn't like. I recommend this place to everyone!

MV_RO7R2N6wL9540psvTXQ.text: The pretzel bun for my brat was excellent. The brat itself was pretty good. The televisions are slightly cramped if you want to watch a few NFL games from different divisions.

MGXKzTnsvQ36CFPR4YJCoQ.text: Amazing place. They have a great beer selection, both bottled and draft. We tried the queso and BBQ chicken flatbread pizza. The queso is served in an edible bowl and the pizza was so good. Excellent bar food. Everyone who works here is friendly and so are the patrons. This is our first visit, but we'll definitely be back.

_2zdIK-W5OqYy-XRXNf_SA.text: For my first visit, I was impressed. The food was good and the service was even better. I ordered the Buffalo Chicken sandwich & fries. The chicken breast was large and crispy with a nice kick. I got the medium sauce. Add cheese, lettuce, tomato & some blue cheese dressing and you've got a tasty chicken sandwich. The fries had great texture & flavor. My wife had the build your own burger that offers a ton of topping selections. She had the side of sweet potato tots. I wasn't a big fan of the tots. Kinda tasted like the frozen kind. Nice little craft beer selection on tap too and with great prices ($4.50 for a pint). I got the OMB Dunkel. Shout out to Jules for the great service!!

EMT1egvb_CBDqHjbtg-Evg.text: Food was above average and the service was good too. I had the turkey burger and sweet potato tots and they were both really good. The tots come with a cinnamon butter dipping sauce on the side and it was awesome. I highly recommend it. My girlfriend had the buffalo chicken sandwich and she said it was good too.  Beer selection had everything you need, including some of the regional micro brews. Sweet Josie Brown Ale is among my favorites they have, Looking forward to coming back when we feel like pub food.

bJmTzZD2LbixDmGjpM7RdA.text: The service is HORRIBLE! I can't speak to the quality of food, because we didn't make it past the hostess stand. The owners need to question why they are paying the three hostesses to stand around and socialize with each other, instead of seating paying customers.

KNEMrO63Rv_8-CA3gYRz7w.text: Another miss for Mint Hill. Very over priced food that's not good at all. That advertise corn hole tournaments on Sunday but don't plan on playing anyone. The vibe is also terrible. Won't be coming here again.

OspCPlW_bIpUzMnJYEBdZw.text: Sucks.  Worst wings I have had. We ordered take out for the game. They only drizzled sauce on top of wings and nothing else.

HKNimtYL4F1M-Fo0Y5UQHg.text: Too loud. Service is bad. Last time I was there the bartender was eating a plate of food with her bare hands in between serving drinks.

-ojzRgRcz4VuWKIyKjpBUA.text: Great little place.  Wonderful atmosphere.  Ery friendly. The menu had a variety of selections.  My burger was cooked perfectly and had a nice flavor.  Loved the sweet potato tots!   Nice selections of beer. Had a very non- rushed relaxing lunch . Nice jod.

ULSl0fa7I6UQgUjYtabyLA.text: Best food in mint Hill in my opinion... I've never sat in and ate I always order take out. Generous portion size, everything I've tried has been pretty good. The sweet potato tots are delicious. I will definitely continue to order from here.

E5PbfKDR1Aj4yFi00AytJg.text: I decided to come here by myself. I ordered the Italian burger with fries.   The fries were great! Very crunchy and seasoned amazing! You don't need ketchup. The burger was pretty good. It wasn't as juicy as I expected for a burger place but it wasn't dry. The only other critique I would have for the burger is a little more sauce, so order extra!!

photos.caption: Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Italian burger with fries

GarOWeAWXQmrz2wj00980g.text: Wow! So impressed. Elevated bar food.  We were not disappointed.  Homemade chicken breast tenders.  Excellent brisket grilled cheese.  The buffalo chicken sandwich was the best we have had.  My Korean BBQ tacos were so tasty.  We didn't try dessert but we will be back.

LGPuL-tOe2ha7zNqsmUZrg.text: Great beer selection, including lots of craft beers. Menu has a great variety and everything I've tried has been good. Nice outdoor seating.

tmQP_AEMviWJNcY_5yCY4Q.text: Deliciousness. We came for the Fried Pickles but the wings were on point! I would totally recommend it to anyone looking for great BBQ wings and great southern hospitality!

photos.caption: Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Fried Pickles! Yummy. Not greasy at all.
Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Cajun and Chipotle BBQ wings

nqMymgH1DzC_JymXy87nTw.text: I love this place, when it isn't too crowded! That's the only problem: it is so popular that it is hard to find a seat and it is also very noisy. But I can't bring myself to put a lesser star rating because the food is SO good. I love the salad I design myself each time, with blackened chicken. Oh! it is yummy. And the salmon tacos with that special slaw (forget what it is called) --they are delicious!

_CpRlkaiu8mKKPFsfrRL2g.text: Love this place. They have the best chicken caesar wrap in the city. I live in Charlotte and used to work in Mint Hill. I would go there for lunch and I've always received excellent service and great food. They never disappoint. I haven't found a place in Charlotte that compares yet. It's a long drive for me but it is so worth it.

XvJnc_tF58lPfSxyeBe2zQ.text: Great food and service on a busy Friday night. Wait wasn't too long and it was well worth the wait. We ordered chicken tenders for our son, which are absolutely delicious- light but crisp breeding was perfect for our 20 month old. The mac-n-cheese burger was amazing! No ketchup needed! My husband's patty melt w/fries was so good he didn't offer me a bite! We went back for takeout that same weekend!

sZokdwz5GC-7ab2UspTSSQ.text: Dunwellz is fine dining meets a pub/bar/grill atmosphere if you ask me. Food is good if not great, especially the Notorious P.I.G. burger. I've only been there two times and I've ordered that sandwich both times and it's very good. Money is fair on the pocket in terms of price. You get can 2 good beers, a meal and a appetizer for around about $25 not too bad. I enjoy the atmosphere, it's nice to get out. And the people are friendly too. Just make sure you have plenty of napkins for this burger/sandwich!

o49aIjutsLqyvi0AcGfSzw.text: I very much enjoyed the food there and am happy to say that it was good. I would come back and bring my friends. It's a little hard to find but it's there in the corner.

dXFxXSxpzG4dzNg0zB7ggw.text: The service and dinner options were great. We tried the wings, tacos and sandwiches. Everyone loved their food, which rarely happens. This restaurant was close to our hotel which was great.

LeI2NUWHDPb1gFtcIRJv2g.text: The atmosphere at Dunwellz is super chaotic. This wasn't the first time i have been here, but it will probably be the last. We were sat at a table that was apparently broken. When I put my arms on the table the whole thing started to flip over. My husband went up to the hostess who ignored him. The waitress came over and I demonstrated how the table was broken. She conferred with the hostess who didn't know where to sit us. After we were FINALLY seated, we waited for about 5 minutes for drink orders. I was about to get up and leave.  The food is pretty decent here. I like their burgers and wings. It's just too loud and too many kids running around.

n7Y73NRtmtBdOsRTDiDa3g.text: Th food is great. We usually pick up and eat at home. The wings and queso dip are awesome! Also, you can build your own sandwich, salad, or burger.

DqGAHJfZATEAjYcm5odrhg.text: I loved this place!  The wait staff was super nice, and the food was good.  I enjoyed it, and next time I am in that area of town and get hungry, I'll stop in again.

3XCc86YCjb7a0kesJXqV-g.text: Ordered buffalo shrimp to go while on lunch and let me tell you, that was the best and the largest shrimp ever!!! I could eat it every day !!! A must try!!! I also love their queso dip

photos.caption: Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States

52ZOkld0-DXYSgYc11O24w.text: Pretty awesome! Good wings and good beer selection. They get 4 stars because the wings were a bit on the small side.

wrFLxkKZ_C0vwJPC_Bzv0Q.text: Food quality here is above average.  Fried pickles are a must-have when we visit.  Daughter is a fan of the spicy buffalo chicken sandwich as well.  I like the build-your-own burgers.  It's become a really popular Mint Hill bar and restaurant.  Can get crowded at times, but great place to hang out with friends.  It will get loud, as can be expected, when crowded.  Wait staff are friendly and attentive.  They have outside seating on the patio, and cornhole boards.  Inside features all the college and pro sports games on flat screens, and music on the jukebox.  All around, great neighborhood bar and grill.

VZlWPFOXB5JFScQL08HFcA.text: It's hard for my husband and I to agree on where to eat but we ended up here and we're both happy. The atmosphere leaves a bit to be desired but the food was good and it seemed like some effort was put into it. I was excited to see gf bread offered that's huge in my life

8vHCj-uj87L6mwRJPCO2ZA.text: They need to learn about seasoning salt..all those wing flavors for nothing...burger taste like ground beef no seasoning.  Fries was the best thing I ate...i won't waste my $40 ever with them again

X5Sag7WrqVDkRg-2K0sWhw.text: Fun, sports bar type atmosphere. Food was fantastic!!! We split Korean tacos, ribs, breakfast burger and both fries. All of it so good!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Korean tacos
Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Ribs
Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Breakfast burger

XBSTcWbheoyDsTQe7E_B9A.text: Ordered in from here last night.  A bunch of apps and some custom order "burgers". They even helped my walk the order our to my csr.    Ken Courtney

photos.caption: Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States

4AOhqCrskuieKlfmKStR7Q.text: We tried Dunwellz for our first time tonight. It was disappointing to say the least. My wife got the Reuben, which was just ok, I got the jambalaya which had a weird taste and wasn't worth the $13 I paid for it. We ordered the fried pickles which was advertised as "1/2 pound" which was a whole lie. We had maybe 15 small fried pickles for $7.25. The atmosphere was absolute chaos. We spent almost $40 for a dinner for 2, and were very disappointed. If you want to find a place where the food and service is "Dunwell" don't let the name fool you, go somewhere else.

eYBkmCNWuQ8nXdGE5YMrVQ.text: Food has decline in quality! There's is no diversity in Dunwellz! Been frequenting this establishment for about six years, and one white male manager, refuses to look me in my eye or even speak to me. He has never spoken to me since I have been going to Dunwellz! Now that the good quality has declined... it's a great time for me to stop going to the neighborhood feeding hole. CHAR BAR 7 has better atmosphere, food and service!!!!

rXeP15T0SGvfpbuMHbab4Q.text: I was visiting Charlotte/Mint Hill with a group of 10 guys from West Virginia to play golf. We ended up being there four days and ate at here three evenings. It was some of the best atmosphere and food that we've ever had on one of our golf trips. The staff and service was some of the best I've ever experienced. Next time in Charlotte it will definitely be a stop. Tried many different meals and drinks, everyone in the gave it five stars. Awesome place.

0-8p0i4yEtDtkZ4_DN2Ifg.text: Went with a group of four for lunch Saturday. It's pub food but the pub food is very tasty. Three of us had tacos - shrimp, fish, and beef. All were very good and very filling. Beer selection is great.

pCb3KhwnC0J9mfJL_t3IBw.text: Well that was disappointing.  This was our Saturday night go to.  But when you have to wait for a hostess, they were sitting at a nearby table talking with a customer, then wait for them to determine which empty table to seat you at you should realize what's might come next.  I didn't expect warm beer, burnt pub chips, or limited follow up by the waitress...guess we'll take our $60, would have been more but no one asked if I wanted another beer or if we wanted dessert, and give it to one of the other restaurants in Mint Hill.

sqvWfdiLm9bMZ_Q3fwgJVw.text: A reliable local burger and salads place. Easy to eat healthy here...or enjoy their amazing sweet potato tots.

eqjI7CtJJp7IZL81Lbv6oA.text: We went to Dunwellz today around 11 AM so granted it was a little early. We really enjoyed all of our food. I had that pimento patty melt on Texas toast. Really good! The hamburger was juicy and delicious with just the right balance of pimento and onion. My husband had the cheesesteak sandwich but it was more like pot roast. The sweet potato tots saved his meal though! Overall good service. We'll be back. As mentioned in other posts, 4 stars relative to mint hill but solid 3.5 in the grand scheme.

mVhiLGFa0Rrg1xATg4cJzw.text: This could be a 4 based on the options in the area but if I am going to just give you a straight up opinion...it is a 3 all day long.  The place was quite lively on Friday night.  It was actually quite loud in there and you can get the whole sports/bar/grill vibe they are  going for.  Nonetheless we were seated right away and opted for the outdoor patio.  This was nice and casual and simple..exactly what we were looking for.  We started with their homemade chips and salsa.  The salsa was very fresh, we practically drank it!  We enjoyed it.  IT had somewhat of a beer flavor but when we asked if it had beer in it we were told no.  Maybe the chef was drinking on the job and accidentally dripped a little in our batch.  Regardless, it was very good and we had no problem woofing it down.  I went with the turkey burger and the husband got a regular burger.  Mine came with a sauce of choice and avocado, some other yummy stuff and on a gluten free bun.  All of the patties are made in house so that is good (except the veggie burger is frozen).  The sauces were somewhat  generic but not bad.  The sweet potato tots were everything they needed to be...greasy, sweet and more of a dessert than anything else!  They were quite good.    They weren't the best burgers we have had but again, there isn't much to compare it to in this area.  So in that regard Dunwellz stands out!  They offer specials throughout the week/weekend, music and other fun themes.  They have a fun, relaxed atmosphere so definitely worth a stop if you are in the area.

HOKN3kSuZe_-6Lsx9_5dYA.text: Nice place...however I'm from out of town and my first experience here was quite crappy. It was unfortunate, because it was a nice place. My food came out cold and the tortilla for my taco was cold and never put on the grill.  Took a really long time to bring me new ones, by then my friends had finished eating.  Afterwards everyone's check was brought out, she said mine was the only one she didn't have a pen for. Not that it's a big deal but I don't feel like I was treated with priority, although I was spending the same money as the others. You pay for a service and expect to get treated with respect, as customers we don't owe restaurants anything, be grateful of our patronage. You're employed because of our support. Please treat customers with respect. Will never go back to this place.

RMM6P0r2-042yyB3lHFHQQ.text: Have eaten here several times, some with my spouse, some with a group of friends.  The food has been consistently good well cooked and well seasoned.  Orders arrive promptly.  We have had burgers, chicken sandwich, salad, fries.  The burgers have been very juicy.  Really like the "create your own" concept. The portions are quite large.  Wait staff is attentive.  Only negative is that the place is noisy. .

qnx2i-bXQ8ncb1svCN76YQ.text: Good Food and Good Service...Great Daily Specials!!.They offer excellent grilled wings that are tossed in great sauces. The Burgers are always cooked exactly to order..Just simply a great place to eat!

ksKOGTAtA86oliUw8-Xftw.text: Ordered takeout from here on 5 different occasions, (Work across the street). The wings, and hamburgers are great. I even ordered the salmon dinner and that was cooked to perfection!! The steamed veggies were blah- no taste but steamed veggies right. French fries are tasty and crispy!! The ambience of the place is fun, they have trivia night and other theme nights. I have yet to go in and eat in but will soon. I recommend them.

D1oAY8IK8RUBVKDYnOEs-g.text: I had the Korean BBQ tacos and they were very tasty!  Great skirt steak, my side was the sweet potato tots. Husband ordered the fish tacos and he liked them too. His side was macaroni and cheese topped wih bacon, he said he wished it had tasted a little cheesier.  Will definitely return!

photos.caption: Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Korean BBQ tacos
Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Fish tacos

Z4_mtFntREvHXKQWjwGMuQ.text: Been going to this place on and off for years and the service is just horrible! They charged me on a takeout order for something they didn't even put in my order, I called to have it fixed and they never went through with what they said. The food is decent, but now I will def not be returning. I kept giving them second chances and trying to go at all different times to see if it was better, it wasn't. One time while I was pregnant we waiting over a hour and a half for food that looked like it was dropped on the ground first. We sent the food back and left! Not worth the time.

d-XN0M0cRGmS2301J3xtEw.text: Health risk. I would avoid any place that thinks it's smart to serve rotten vegetables in 2 wraps, it was slimy and tangy. When we called to complain the manager wouldn't even come to the phone. Save yourself the poor service and awful food and just avoid it.

nbpbbbCc4_0jxu6HMUhpxQ.text: A hidden gem in Mint Hill. Friendly staff. Great beer selection and daily specials. Eclectic menu. Including the beautiful and tasty Doughnut burger and cinnamon sweet potato tots.

photos.caption: Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Drink local
Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Doughnut burger.

v-QzaY7WFTpgZHkVmbOTjQ.text: Dunwellz is subject to what I call the "Mint Hill Factor." Anywhere else in Charlotte, Dunwellz would be a 3-star place. In Mint Hill, it is definitely 4 stars, especially considering the alternatives (or the fact that there aren't really alternatives).   While it is far from a taproom, Dunwellz has a decent selection of beers on tap and in cans and bottles. They have regular drink specials as well. Sometimes you just want a simple beer from OMB, and Dunwellz delivers that.   The food is pretty good. I'm a big fan of the sweet potato tots with the crack/cinnamon sugar butter dipping sauce. The sandwiches are good but not great. If you're looking for decent pub food, you'll find it here.   I never seek out Dunwellz, but I'll come here now and then when I am sick of other local options. It's definitely not a destination if you're making any sort of trip.

lcq6MOyUU3iHvxkX2KFsvg.text: Best burgers in my opinion and I had my staple: donut burger with A1 and Dr. Pepper sauce,  added onion straws!  My daughter had fish and chips and that was great, a friend had fish tacos and loved them. Also had the honey chili shrimp and a phenomenal dessert! Brownie that was so light it felt like a mousse vs a brownie :)

photos.caption: Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Swiss mushroom burger with an over easy egg!!
Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States. Dessert!
Photo of Dunwellz - Mint Hill, NC, United States

F9ivL7-mzKbfnLO1rKUFFQ.text: Really tasty burgers.  I had the meatloaf burger with fries and it was big and tasty. Previous reviews are right- the play it safe on the draft beers. But overall nice experience.

MTssKIPyHvv4KGyStc-a0w.text: Excellent Wings!!  Was there for the first time last week.  Staff very helpful and knowledge about menu.  I had a Reuben was very good just not a fan of the texas toast..next time i will get it on rye.  Definitely going back for the wings!!

gLDgfDG9u2ew3GeXTsFb9Q.text: This is a nice place to go after work or when you just feel like getting out. Among the other places in Mint Hill, this new spot holds its own. The food is fresh, very tasty and the menu has a good variety. The staff is super friendly and do a great job of making the customers happy. The atmosphere is fun and free flowing. They also have a back patio with plenty of seating as well as corn-hole. Great for a cool summer night! See you there!

5PuIsmJqDu0LMX-Jy47XfA.text: Mediocre food that is expensive. Build your own sandwiches for 9.00  portions are small. Best thing was the sweet potatoe tots (all 10 they give you). Had a  side of ranch dressing that was watery!!!  Place has potential but needs to rethink either their prices or portions.  Another whiff for food in mint hill

rDzkZcP9mWinBuA3JJjD-A.text: Better than expected. I have been here multiple times for lunch and dinner and never a complaint about the food. Waitstaff is a bit on the immature side but it is half a bar.

x1KjafdGeGicFOvCyOmFOA.text: Love this place! Great daily specials! Good bar staff and super yummy food ! Mac and Cheese empanadas are a must !

hoAKt-8YxtHad2ZU-U--3g.text: What a great place.  They have an extensive beer selection and some great sandwiches.  My wife had the Buffalo chicken sandwich and said it was the best she'd ever had.  I had the meatloaf burger, which was incredible.  My oldest son had a burger which he said, and I quote: "almost brought him to tears".  My youngest had the BBQ wings, which he loved.  Great service too.  We were there after 1:00 on a Saturday and it was still crowded but food came out fast and hot.  This will likely be our new go-to joint.  Can't recommend enough.  Plus, they're locally owned, which is a bonus.  This part of Charlotte has too many crappy chains or unremarkable local places.  This place has verve and great unpretentious eats.

dPhH13jemDqFu3eNM2lrYA.text: Food is passable for what they're trying to do. Service is ok. Seeing waitresses and hostesses talking on their phones, fixing their makeup, etc. while customers are waiting on service is unacceptable. Come here if you want fairly good food and a bunch of teenager/twenty-somethings to waste your time.

nT_GuVGDMOzeCYBP6N79cw.text: Just moved to the area and we have already been twice. Everything we ordered has been great. Love the creative cocktails and the burgers are super good!

zv_bGiGREmlUmOksX_-mkw.text: Like I say, today was my first time ever. I love the food and the staff were very friendly. What I like about it that place has so many televisions that I can watched and enjoy, while I'm eating

cS10k01JP-MzIE4MDkImIg.text: The place was filled with people, which was to be expected on St. Patrick's Day. My husband and I were pretty pleased with the burgers we got - everything was done well, and there were lots of options for what to get on your burger. I liked how you could order one of their recommended creations, or create your own from lots of options. It was tasty, but it didn't stick in my mind as a place I would crave to visit again.

thFamFNPW95WkTkZcwZHGQ.text: I love the food here!! Especially the salads! They have a great beer selection, and great drink specials. But this is also my favorite place to get a salad: it's a make your own, with blackened chicken. Yummy!!! So many places have precooked rubbery chicken but this is freshly grilled. Oh my! It is so good. And another great dish is the salmon tacos. The only drawback is the noise--it's a very popular place, so it can get quite noisy. But the food is worth it.

gb8n47qxONPQl7IExZ8qsQ.text: Sometimes, the value of a restaurant is significantly influenced by its surroundings. A good place can be less desirable if it's hard to get there. Conversely, a mediocre place can be great if it's convenient. Dunwellz falls into the latter category.  Dunwellz is fairly middle-of-the-road in both food and decor. The food is decent. It's not amazing: fairly typical bar quality, but it's not bad, either. My chicken quesadilla was filling and not dried out, but it was slightly on the bland side. The same could be said for P's burger. The menu is divided into appetizers, burgers, sandwiches, and so on, and you get to "build your own" within each section. That's where the custom part comes in.   Nevertheless, Dunwellz is A-OK in my book, and the reason for that is they're open till 11:00 during the week. That makes them one of the few late-ish night options in Mint Hill. And for that, I say hooray.

_h0l5Og5am7WYCYO5dxuhw.text: We had heard so much about Dunwells that I guess our expectations were just too high. It was just OK. The food was no better and no worse than any other casual dining. Not a lot of imagination or care. The service is indifferent at best. The staff seems more intent on socializing with each other than taking care of customers.

Z4wDclS5ifhSn95KSJoJAw.text: Awesome place to grab a sandwich and have a beer. Friendly staff and good food. Everything I've  tried so far in the menu has been good.

cE5Q84TViN0MBJ5uGWxrVg.text: Great place!  Good food and service!  Reasonably priced.  Daily drink specials.  GOOD WINGS!  Try the Cuban sandwich, It's awesome!  Kid friendly. Purdy waitresses!

y7QLfN-F5GtlPy5yhGLcWA.text: Love me some Dunwellz, I'm from out west, and since I've been to Charlotte Dunwellz has been my favorite burger joint for sure. Staff is friendly and food is great!

JZ9myYXgmr4ZlYIvw_Zl-Q.text: I'm giving this place four stars, let me explain why. My family thinks it was a five star place, but, to be honest, the wings definitely didn't impress me, and the buffalo chicken sandwhich was acceptional, but not outstanding. The service was absolutely outstanding! The price is well worth it! Definitely a place to check out!

aW1NLVV-ayeDCo6H0ibA1Q.text: Good wings. Very interesting burger selection...the doughnut burger is yummy. Great place to watch sports

4P4c0ZtOZjhyRjzTj-GSJw.text: We have eaten here several times and always enjoy our food and service. Sweet potato tater tots with the cinnamon butter is sooo good. Service is good, and we've had burgers, wings, and a few other items and we've been pleased with everything.

HJtq6ZFx3iwnkAMtmvkjgw.text: Great spot to grab a quick meal for lunch. Wait staff is always friendly and their burgers are always on point. It's the only thing I have tried but why worry about changing it up when it's good.  Oh yea and their fries are legit

c2p8DPwz_VwKbHsLqMP5Ww.text: Great food and nice staff. I wish their seating was more like booths and not tables but that's the only downside for me personally. Great local place!

rbvNwUS3nSx-YuE2H4aBWQ.text: This is a nice place. Nothing special but the food was Kool and they had some drink specials. I had the Turkey Reuben and fries. I went on a Sunday around 2 in the afternoon so it wasn't crowded, I was able to get in and out without much hassle. I will give them a try again. I talked to a few ppl and they gave me some other options for food the next time I come thru. They say the meatloaf burger is HUGE.

vrkeLSqGSFHs_K2-v3V6Ig.text: You have to come here! If you hate South 21 (because it sucks) and their ilk of terrible bland 5 guys style awful burgers, then come to Dunwellz.   I had the breakfast burger - excellent. Sausage gravy was great and the sweet patato tots were the best I've had. Sweet and soft in the middle, crunchy exterior. Their beer batter fries are good as well.  My son had a quesadilla, straight out napoleon dynamite. His tortilla shell was crispy, as it should be, because it was cooked ib the griddle. Notice how most places that serve quesadilla around here serve it up with raw doughy bread?   I am satisfied. I'll be back.

4xZOKK9_yaZ4qM7JVYj0iw.text: Some of the best burgers around. The pub chips are too die for. Some of the sandwich combinations sound weird on paper, but try them. These people know how to put favors together to make the perfect bite. It is my to go place.

Dz_SafdAygMba1jX77ek9Q.text: Fast friendly service. Burgers are awesome!!  Great specials.   Love the chili nachos and the homemade chips are also excellent.    Good kid specials on Sundays as well as beer prices.

XxqIrRscxMUkVFoyruawuQ.text: This is the best place to get a burger or chicken fingers or just about anything your tummy desires.  You have to try the Dr. Pepper BBQ sauce!  Hands down that stuff makes any meal there just that more amazing!

ZG076XTvrKRbPWEdJ0nUBw.text: Mmmmm definitely not 4 stars tried the new Habanera peach wings , not a hint of habanera just like a peach glaze . Ordered then crispy well that didn't happen either. nDm2wj5Xav5nplHfL0A8Lw.text: I could not believe when someone walked up behind me after I just sat down with my coworker and some bald-headed gentleman walked in just after I paid my tab. The food was terribly greasy please take your Statin before you go there and for some reason whoever this person was very unrespectful to the patrons and I did not feel like getting into a confrontation at that time. Hp-foQBzfQJZi3X0p-UwCA.text: Sat at bar, Ton's of tv's! They have Guinness on tap!! Place was kinda busy for Friday afternoon 2ish. Salmon BLT was good, not dry, good flavor. Barely ate the tots as sandwich was good size. Burger ordered medium rare. as bartender said not much seasoning/flavor but was juicy. Onion rings good...too wide and seemed not cooked long enough.  Bartender was awesome. poor thing the liquor shelves were put too high up the wall behind the beer taps. Got footstool?! Will visit again

2Z2K3JVK_7EjGNXPyWSxTg.text: Saturday night at 8pm I scored myself a HUGE burger, built to my preference with a side for only $7.50 which is their speciality every Saturday after 7pm - I got it to-go so I can't comment on the service but I built my burger with Bacon, Mozzarella, guacamole, lettuce, onion and pickles! Pub chips with ranch were not fried properly, a lot of the chips were over cooked and extremely oily. So they tasted like burnt oil and the burger was also COVERED in grease.. it must of been from the bacon or melted cheese? But it was almost soggy when I unwrapped it to eat and the drive was only 8 minutes home from the restaurant. After dabbing up the grease on the burger bun which required 3 napkins total  the flavor was great and the burger was cooked and built to exactly my request! It was a thick, juicy patty with a lot of flavor and I would definitely try this place again, especially if I'm in the area on a Saturday night. Hopefully the greasy-grease overload was just a fluke and it's not always like that

But I knew when I tasted their salmon tacos, I made the right choice and found my favorite menu item. The salmon was perfectly seasoned and perfectly cooked! TVKTZjzOwSJFGTdsH7cn-w.text: This place is awesome!!! My neighbor told me about this place & I just had to check it out. Awesome bar food, cool setting, etc. I tried the brisket grilled cheese one time. This most recent time I tried the pot roast sandwich, which had pot roast, mashed potatoes, and gravy all on the sandwich! Also highly recommend the sweet potato tots with this amazing honey cinnamon butter they serve on the side. Haven't had the room for dessert yet, but that menu features lava cake & fried Oreos, so bring your appetite.

mJsn1TDm8XA-ghhjY8eN3g.text: This was just okay. The fried Pickles were delicious. They had a nice heat that remained as after taste. The chicken tenders were your general run of the mill tenders, the Korean barbecue tacos tasted like unseasoned London broil that was chewy and not able to be consumed in a single bite. The fries were pretty good and well seasoned. We got a side of ranch that had lumps all throughout. It was questionable if the ranch was bad as it had an odd aftertaste.   Service was good.

rqcS3BZiSEm0_Y_xQUXt9Q.text: This was such a wonderful experience!! The food was amazing and fresh!! Mac n cheese, club sandwiches and chicken tenders were bomb. The pub chips were yummy too!

_iTOOD0KTPx3SD3YKCZiCQ.text: My family and I were there for dinner on a Wednesday at 6 pm. There was no wait and the staff was friendly once you walked in.   We ordered the fried pickles for appetizers which my kids liked so that's a plus! My husband liked the dressing more than the fried pickle. He also thought the sweet tea was perfect cause it didn't taste like full on sugar load.  I ordered the salmon street tacos and I actually enjoyed the flavor of it. Sweet potato tots were my side dish and it came with a sweet butter sauce. I was actually fine without it cause the tots tasted sweet already. But I wasn't able to finish my second taco cause I thought it was plenty!  Our server was attentive and sweet. I appreciate when you don't have to request for extra refills and they are aware to provide without calling on them.   Not sure I'll be rushing back soon but definitely will visit again to try their other items on their menu.

rdokyuf6496MXKHNe7LAjg.text: My favorite restaurant!  It's a great family friendly place & the food and service is always terrific!

7ho28Rx_BZ0_9uIaGQO_rQ.text: Didn't get to write this from about a week ago but here it is.  I went to Dunwellz and ordered some take out from the Parking Lot, then called in and asked Lisa if she would bring it to the car, because I have some mobility issues.  She did so gladly and when I went to leave, my car wouldn't start and it was 10 pm.  Lisa told me she would get help and ran back in!! Wow !  Within a minute, her Manager, Joe can out to help me trouble shoot the problem, after a few minutes he brought his own car over to jump start the battery and it worked!!  My hero!! Kind and very helpful.  I hope he and Lisa read this and know how much I appreciate them.  (Here's hoping I got the names right) PS the food was Delish!!

xMSM3GGP42WuLFagdPBV5Q.text: Great food, atmosphere, and service.   We've loved everything we have tried.  Salmon, burgers, salads, etc.    They make their own dressings for the salads.  Yum!    It can get crowded at certain times, but we usually have a late lunch or early dinner and get in without a wait.   Check out their specials online.

mvCmhNWJuce0eU8njTJH_Q.text: Some really good bar food. They have specials everyday and different events that are really fun!! And their chicken tenders and fries are GREAT!! In high school we went every Friday and it was a great environment. The staff is very helpful and sweet!

hRUMUh9-yxAjNwwOZFh6Lw.text: This place is a nice family restaurant with a bar. The staff always has a excellent attitude, and great service! The food is also very good as well! The crowd is usually mixed between families, and younger crowd. Highly recommend!

U9DS8mF0S8g5oIkjMt6eig.text: Just wanted to give a quick update. Dunwellz has really stepped up on food quality and presentation. They changed the menu since my last review added new things got rid of others, I do miss the chicken penne as it was one of my favorites. The build your own burger is always a great option as well as the salads, and there mac and cheese is tasty. My only one wish is it wasn't so loud it's so hard to talk to others at your table and I feel like I always have to ask the waitress to repeat what she said. The service is great everyone is really friendly and on the ball. This restaurant is one of the best around!

I got the patty melt with pimento cheese and it was amazing. Will definitely be back to try more things.   One thing I didn't like was how loud the music was. It was blaring. They were playing like music trivia or something and our waitress had to scream at us. Otherwise I'd definitely like to try more menu items in the future.

Ripk90sAM9YuMU4oSxFiVg.text: First time here. Great experience. Great menu selection (food and lots of beers!). Went for lunch.  Prompt service..great job and very attentive server.  I had a BYOS (build your own salad)!! Very good!! Will be back for dinner and alcohol next time!! Thanks to all the staff!

Tw02utRpCMqnWxSdL1li0Q.text: First time visiting Dunwellz. About a 30 minute ride from Belmont and "Wellz" worth the drive! On the owners recommendation we shared The Notirious P.I.G.... A perfectly cooked Angus burger loaded with roasted pork and a spicy Dr. Pepper BBQ sauce, topped with cheddar cheese and onion straws! WOW!!!! We also shared the Mac & Cheese Empenadas (penne pasta with a blend of cheddar and Monterey Hack cheeses. Sooo darn delicious!! Great serves from Abi as well! We will be back!

0H6N_thLXbjgb-k8szou8g.text: Went on a Saturday evening with out of town company.  All of the food was great along with the service.  Dunwellz had Music Bingo this evening and we played and had a blast.  The place was crowded and had a good atmosphere.  Will definitely come back here again.

EWvUnBGsOvqB6M-K_fXaRQ.text: So my boyfriend brought me here on 5/2/19 to celebrate a special occasion. We were seated right away. All seemed ok. Took a little while to get our drinks, no biggie. We ordered potato skins app, me a burger and Mac and cheese, home fish tacos and pub chips. Our app: three potato skins. And they were rotten. After I was thoroughly horrified, and out server had disappeared, we finally found someone to take them away. When our meals came out, my man and cheese was ice cold. We had to flag down our server. When I said this is cold "Oh, did you want it warm?" Seriously? Then I checked my burger. Now I have food allergies and when I order I'm specific as to what to not put on my burger. It was on there, and had been scraped off, and had I eaten it, I could have ended up in the hospital. So I never got to eat. My boyfriend was so mad, because he wanted to celebrate my new job/career, not have me use an epi pen.  In the midst of this, a manager with stink face brought my macaroni, said they had warmed it. No thank you. Never again. How about you focus on service instead of trying to be the cool bar. It's obviously not working for you.

1_OtU9o8oRBfakthcTgETw.text: Food was bland, service was fine (which is above average for mint hill). Just not my cup of tea.

tLJYzd20jzT4WyyHAaIQ9A.text: Everything I have ordered off the menu has been amazing. We ordered wingz, The Cuban sandwich, shrimp tacos and the brisket grilled cheese with fries, all was amazing. Previously, I ordered the salmon and that also was delicious!

VI0WUHcqAiaASRdYx2qHuw.text: This was the very first place in town we tried out before moving here. It's always been one of our go to places in Mint Hill when we are looking at when choosing where we want to eat. Everything we have had here has been great. Generally we start with the spicy fried pickles. Then we have the make your own burger (we choose black bean). My favorite though is the shrimp tacos blackened. The wasabi dressing is amazing. We love the pub chips and the sweet potato tots which comes with a cinnamon butter. Yes those are to die for. They always have the local brews to drink which is always a reason we come.  My friend and I have come for karaoke before. That's been highly entertaining!

yUPTSK6kwCY8OTpbY3GT6Q.text: This was hands down the worst experience I've ever had at a restaurant. I have been to Dunwellz a number of times before and had a decent experience, but after today, I'm never coming back. Here's why...  My friends and I went here for lunch. At first things were going well. The waitress came right to our table and was very accommodating. Then about 15 minutes in, we started noticing some of the waitresses staring at us and talking. We thought that was a bit weird, but then things got weirder. Many of us had finished our drinks, and our waitress wasn't coming to our table to refill them. We could see her looking at us, but she wouldn't come to our table. Then the manager brought our food out, and he seemed a bit miffed at us. Every one of us at the table were racking our brains trying to figure out what we did to cause everyone to act so offended. I finally got up from the table and brought my empty drink glass to our waitress to ask her to refill my drink and the drinks of my friends at the table. She refilled my drink, but would not bring it back to our table. Another waitress did. A few minutes later, I took another empty glass from our table and asked a different waitress for a refill. She refilled the drink, and our waitress handed me the checks to bring back to our table. Then she realized she had forgotten a couple of our checks and came over to our table for the first time in half an hour to bring those two checks. One of us asked her what was going on, and our waitress told us the hostess had overheard one of us say our waitress was a little b***h. Of course, none of us had said anything even close to that. The hostess was lying. But because our waitress believed the hostess, we were treated like trash. It was also clear that the manager also believed the lie that was told about us. So if you like going to restaurants where employees won't lie about you, save yourself the trouble and don't go to Dunwellz.

mjn_6UqswesjxI7PODgSSw.text: We ate here for the first time around 8:00 on a Sunday evening. It is essentially a sports bar that serves up pretty good food and has friendly, attentive service.  My wife and I both ordered tacos. The braised beef, although a bit salty, was tender and tasty and was served with sour cream. The side salad was fresh and loaded with good stuff.  The shrimp tacos came piled high with medium sized shrimp and a delicious wasabi sauce. The sweet potato tater tots with cinnamon butter were addictive. Overall bill was about $29 without tip.  Rounding things out, the atmosphere was casual and the sanitation score was an impressive 97.5. Would consider returning if in the area. If Yelp allowed, I'd rate it closer to a 3.5 than a 3.

G-ib5CwzmWhhh7Ll_GqrYQ.text: Hands down- best place to eat in Mint Hill. This pub has an expansive menu and I've never been disappointed in anything I've ordered. Their wings are fantastic as well as the southwestern egg rolls, their nachos, and their burgers. They always have great daily specials. The service is always friendly and attentive. Come check out this great spot in Mint Hill!

Nxduy6mcxN2MXGGEPmiVYQ.text: The food was okay. It wasn't the best but the server definitely made up for this. She was so attentive to us and especially the kids. I will go back simply for the amazing service we received.

VDq4lKzVMI6Vh_lh9o1T1w.text: had the most amazing burger here the other day and my friends got sandwiches and everybody agrees that this place is really amazing. If you're looking for a great place to eat in the neighborhood this is definitely one that you want to give a shot to. Not only was the food amazing with the staff is super friendly and I love that here

7pgQ0n81k6sbDFYR7SQsLA.text: This place is a hidden gem! The food and the atmosphere are delightful! 10 out of 10 would go again!!!

Bah5QvrHYOAEjjQTOTQ4-Q.text: Dunwellz does food well! Their meatloaf sandwich is pretty amazing, but so was their Bhan Mi, Vietnamese style pork sandwich! It was by far the best thing there, but sadly it's been taken off the menu. (Only reason this fabulous little eatery doesn't get all 5-stars from me) ((Yes that's a ploy to hold the fifth star hostage 'till y'all bring it back!!))   In all seriousness though, Dunwellz is  a nice little gem in Mint Hill. Friendly staff, nice patio, fun triviaon Tuesdays, great food, plus who the heck thinks up Dr. Pepper wings?!?!?   Give them a shot...

4yOgU8e7jbB6ay2n79Vz7A.text: Being relatively new to the area, my partner and I were looking for something good to eat.  We took a look at what is around and found this place.  First, it is so welcoming, from the interior decorating, to the hostess, and the wait staff, you get a feel of home and hospitality.  Next, the food is delicious. It took little to no time to get our appetizers and then our main course.  Finally, after mentioning that we were first timers, the owner came and talked to us to introduce herself.  If you want delicious food in an amazing atmosphere, give this place a shot.  We will definitely be back.

ILJPX6qv4iB4MmNNSNztCg.text: This place has become a staple in Mint Hill.  My parents love in the area and absolutely love coming here.    There are food and drink specials every day that are really good deals for those on a budget.  $2.50 bud lights, $7 burgers after 7 on saturdays etc.  We came to celebrate my dad's retirement and the staff was very accommodating.  They reserved a table for us and let us drop a cake off early!  I ventured out and tried the sweet potato and black bean burger in a wrap.  It was AHHHHMAZING.  My husband got wings, which are always on point, my mom and dad order the chicken sandwich on Texas toast (huge portion), my sister got the buffalo sandwich, and my sisters fiance got the chicken tenders.  The food was brought out promptly and everyone devoured it quickly.  You can create your own salad or sandwich which is a nice menu addition as well!  I would recommend all of those options or the burger if you come after 7!
